oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1857 correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: correspondence; death; 1850s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Geo. C. Furber, Yuka (?), CA, to My Dear Friend James. Letter of condolence on death of James's father [Britton Duke]. [Note: letter written on a folded page, booklet-style. Page 1 & 4 are on one side of the paper and 2 & 3 are on the other.]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Furber, Geo. C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: two-sided, handwritten, folded to 8 x 10 in.
